import React, { Component } from 'react' import { date } from 'yup/lib/locale'; import axios from 'axios'; import './contact.css' export class Contact_select extends Component { render() { console.log(this.props.deleteContact) const deleteContact = this.props.destroyContact const message = this.props.contact let role; if(this.props.contact.subject === "recruteur"){ role = ( <>

{message.id} {message.nom} Recruteur

Email: {message.email}

Telephone : {message.telephone}


{message.created_at} Message : {message.message}
) }else{ role = ( <>

{message.id} {message.nom} Chauffeur

Email: {message.email}

Telephone : {message.telephone}

{message.created_at} Message : {message.message}
) } return ( <> {role} ) } } export default Contact_select
